sections.title: Project Context and Role Fit
sections.goal: Understand candidate's background and how it aligns with Phoenix Feature Store's build phase requirements
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your recent MLOps experience, especially with feature store implementations?
What do you see as the main challenges in building an online/offline feature serving system?
How do you typically collaborate with QA teams during the build phase of a platform project?

sections.title: Technical Deep Dive: Feature Store Architecture
sections.goal: Assess technical depth in designing and operating feature stores with drift monitoring
sample_questions: Describe your approach to ensuring consistency between online and offline feature stores.
How would you implement drift detection and alerting in this context?
What considerations do you take for schema evolution in a feature store?

sections.title: Integration with QA and Risk-Based Testing
sections.goal: Explore how MLOps and QA intersect, focusing on traceability and risk mitigation
sample_questions: How can we ensure that feature transformations are fully traceable from raw data to model input?
What role can risk-based testing play in validating feature pipelines?
Have you worked with runbooks or policies like POL-QA-014 for testing strategies?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify and reason about dependencies with other Novereon projects (e.g., Helios Datalake, Nimbus Observability)
sample_questions: How would Phoenix integrate with Helios Datalake ingestion processes?
What observability hooks would you add to align with Nimbus Observability's standards?
Can you give an example of how a change in one subsystem could impact Phoenix's SLOs?

sections.title: Operationalization and CI/CD
sections.goal: Evaluate strategies for deploying and maintaining feature store pipelines and serving infrastructure
sample_questions: What’s your preferred CI/CD setup for deploying feature store updates?
How would you manage hotfix rollbacks (e.g., using RB-FS-034)?
What’s your approach to canarying new feature definitions?

sections.title: Decision-Making and Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Assess ability to make informed tradeoffs under constraints, considering policies and SLAs
sample_questions: If under SLA pressure (e.g., SLA-HEL-01), how do you prioritize between accuracy and latency?
Can you describe a time you had to balance feature freshness against system stability?
What risks do you foresee in Phoenix’s build phase and how would you mitigate them?
